SEARCH
Package iscte.lige.k.dataStructures

Class Property

java.lang.Object
iscte.lige.k.dataStructures.Property
public class Property extends Object
Represents a land property with spatial, administrative and ownership data. Each property can also maintain a list of its neighboring properties.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Property

      public Property(String parcelaId, String parcelaNum, double perimeter, double area, org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry geometry, Owner owner, String parish, String county, String island)
      Constructs a new Property instance with all required information. Automatically adds this property to the given owner's property list.
      Parameters:
      parcelaId - unique identifier of the land parcel
      parcelaNum - registry number
      perimeter - perimeter length in meters
      area - area in square meters
      geometry - geometric shape of the property
      owner - the owner of the property
      parish - the parish where the property is located
      county - the county where the property is located
      island - the island where the property is located

  • Method Details

    • addNeighbour

      public void addNeighbour(Property property)
      Adds a neighboring property to this property. Duplicate or null values are ignored.
      Parameters:
      property - the neighboring property to add
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the property is null
